title: Molarity Utilization Strategies for Enhancing Nursing Simulation Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing simulation operation experience and intervention technique understanding
context.additional_context: Acquiring techniques to enhance realism using moulage in medical simulation environments; learners—administrative professionals—complete project-based tasks for language domain application

learning_goals: Learners can classify 60 malleable elements according to Dieckmann’s three realism theory domains (psychological/physical/social).
Learners can analyze educational effectiveness using a scale that evaluates malleable application levels aligned with simulation scenarios.
Learners can develop malleable planning documents reflecting expert consensus and apply them to actual simulations through PBL team projects.

resources: Moulage Kit (Artificial Blood, Wound Simulation Materials, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
